item.title: Tips to grab a good Black Friday bargain - style, soul, story
item.description:
Tips to grab a good Black Friday bargain - style, soul, story

Well, this is awkward. We launch a blog on ethical style and just two weeks later, Black Friday comes along to tempt me back into my old ways. I'm long overdue a new winter jacket and could do with a new dress or two and god knows, there are some cheap deals being touted by all the major high street brands at the moment.

item.title: 5 things I learnt while not buying clothes for 10 months - style, soul, story
item.description:
5 things I learnt while not buying clothes for 10 months - style, soul, story

5 things I learnt while not buying clothes for 10 months Confessions of an environmental shopaholic I'm an environmentalist and I love new clothes. This contradiction has been tearing me apart for years.

item.title: And so it begins - style, soul, story
item.description:
And so it begins - style, soul, story

It was in my home economics class at school in Penang, Malaysia, that I discovered I loved making clothes. The first piece I made was a brightly coloured waistcoat, vibrantly patterned with a hideous, early 90s mix of reds and fluorescent yellows and blues and greens on the front and black on the back.
